availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Kentucky. H.J. Billings owned a foundry and worked as a machinist in Louisville, Kentucky in 1860.

Spouse: Mary A. Billings
Children: William Billings, Henry Billings, Barnett Billings, Emily Billings, Ellen Billings

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 7, page 56.
Kentucky Death Records, 1852-1964, Large Cities, 1879-1887, Film 7007127: Louisville, Books 5-6, pages 92-3.
